Name: TV
Text: And now turning to other news. The beloved town journalist, Old Man McLudum...

Name: TV
Text: Has unfortunately passed away. The death has been attributed to natural causes.

Name: TV
Text: While known around the town, he was otherwise said to live a sedientry lifestyle,

Name: TV
Text: and he has no next of kin. It is unclear who, if anyone, will keep up the local newspaper.

Name: Dad
Text: OI! Get to bed! Turn that TV off and settle down!
